page.title: 03St Mary's Church Ticehurst
page.content: Many people nowadays think church is a solemn place but they are wrong. Many fun things happen at church. At the moment we are preparing for our festival week. Many people taking part are putting up their tableaux for it. A large group of ladies including my mum are sewing new tapestries for the kneelers wich are long and narrow and show local and country scenes. Six people from Ticehurst form a bell ringing group. On average about twenty people sing in the choir on Sunday. We have choir practice every Friday at 6.30. The congregation is usually regular except on special occasions. On every first Sunday of the month we have a family service. Sunday school joins in with this. I think they are better than other services because the sermons have pictures to illustrate them.
